00047 AsymDbFile::~AsymDbFile()
00048 {

00050    fDbFile = 0;
00051 
00052    // There must be a more elegant way to erase pointers
00053    DbCommonRunMap::iterator icr;
00054    DbCommonRunMap::iterator bcr = fCommonRunDB.begin();
00055    DbCommonRunMap::iterator ecr = fCommonRunDB.end();

00058       delete icr->second;

00068 DbEntry* AsymDbFile::Select(std::string runName)
00069 {
00070    fDbFile = fopen(fDbFileName.c_str(), "r");
00071 
00072    if (!fDbFile) {
00073       Error("AsymDbFile", "%s file not found. Force exit", fDbFileName.c_str());
00074       exit(-1);
00075    }
00076 
00077    char    *line   = NULL;
00078    //UInt_t   iLine  = 1;
00079    size_t   len    = 0;
00080    ssize_t  nBytes = 0;
00081    DbEntry *currentRun = 0;
00082 
00083    while (true) {
00084 
00085       ssize_t nb = getline(&line, &len, fDbFile);
00086       nBytes += nb;
00087 
00088       // if reached the end of file
00089       //if (nb < 0) { if (!currentRun) return 0; }
00090 
00091       string sline(line);
00092       //cout << setw(8) << iLine++ << " (" << setw(8) << nb << "): " << sline;
00093 
00094       // Skip blank and comment lines
00095       if ( TPRegexp("^(\\s*)//(.*)$").MatchB(sline) )// ||
00096            //TPRegexp("^(\\s*)$").MatchB(sline) )
00097       { continue; }
00098 
00099       if (TPRegexp("\\[([\\w,\\W]+)\\]").MatchB(sline) || nb < 0) {
00100 
00101          if (currentRun) {
00102             //currentRun->UpdateValues();
00103             UpdateCommonFields(*currentRun);
00104             //PrintCommon();
00105             //printf("--- %s, %s\n", runName.c_str(), currentRun->fRunName.c_str());
00106 
00107             if (currentRun->fRunName == runName) {
00108                printf("Found run %s\n", runName.c_str());
00109                currentRun->UpdateFields(*fCommonRunDB[currentRun->fPolId]);
00110 
00111                fclose(fDbFile);
00112                return currentRun;
00113 
00114             } else if (runName == "") {
00115 
00116                fDBRuns.insert(*currentRun);
00117                delete currentRun;
00118 
00119                if (nb < 0) { fclose(fDbFile); return 0; }
00120 
00121             } else if (nb < 0) {
00122                delete currentRun;
00123                fclose(fDbFile);
00124                return 0;
00125             } else {
00126                delete currentRun;
00127             }
00128 
00129          } else if (nb < 0) {
00130             delete currentRun;
00131             fclose(fDbFile);
00132             return 0;
00133          }
00134 
00135          TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("\\[([\\w,\\W]+)\\]").MatchS(sline);
00136          TString subStr = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00137          delete subStrL;
00138 
00139          //printf("XXX found %s\n", subStr.Data());
00140 
00141          currentRun = new DbEntry();
00142          currentRun->fRunName = subStr;
00143 
00144       } else if (currentRun) {
00145          currentRun->ProcessLine(sline);
00146       }
00147    }
00148 
00149    // if ever get here return 0
00150    return 0;
00151 }

00153 
00155 void AsymDbFile::Delete(std::string runName)
00156 {
00157    fDbFile = fopen(fDbFileName.c_str(), "r");
00158 
00159    if (!fDbFile) {
00160       Error("AsymDbFile", "%s file not found. Force exit", fDbFileName.c_str());
00161       exit(-1);
00162    }
00163 
00164    string newDbFileName = "run99.db";
00165    char   *line = NULL;
00166    size_t  len  = 0;
00167    ssize_t nBytes = 0;
00168    bool    skipLine = false;
00169    ofstream newDbFile;
00170    newDbFile.open(newDbFileName.c_str());
00171 
00172    while (true) {
00173 
00174       ssize_t nb = getline(&line, &len, fDbFile);
00175       if (nb < 0) break;
00176 
00177       nBytes += nb;
00178 
00179       string sline(line);
00180       //cout << "line: " << sline;
00181 
00182       TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("\\[([\\w,\\W]+)\\]").MatchS(sline);
00183 
00184       if (subStrL->GetEntriesFast() < 2) {
00185          delete subStrL;
00186          if (!skipLine) newDbFile << sline;
00187          continue;
00188       }
00189 
00190       TString subStr = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00191       delete subStrL;
00192 
00193       if (subStr == runName) {
00194          //printf("XXX found %s\n", runName.c_str());
00195          skipLine = true;
00196       } else
00197          skipLine = false;
00198 
00199       if (!skipLine) newDbFile << sline;
00200    }
00201 
00202    newDbFile.close();
00203    fclose(fDbFile);
00204 
00205    //remove(fDbFileName.c_str());
00206 
00207    int errcode = rename(newDbFileName.c_str(), fDbFileName.c_str());
00208    //printf("outfile %s\n", fDbFileName.c_str());
00209 
00210    if (errcode == 0)
00211       printf("DB file was updated\n");
00212    else
00213       printf("ERROR: DB file was NOT updated: %s\n", strerror(errno));
00214 }

00218 void AsymDbFile::Dump()
00219 {
00220    ofstream dbFile;
00221    dbFile.open(fDbFileName.c_str(), ios_base::out | ios_base::trunc);
00222 
00223    // Remove all common info
00224    DbCommonRunMap::iterator icr;
00225    DbCommonRunMap::iterator bcr = fCommonRunDB.begin();
00226    DbCommonRunMap::iterator ecr = fCommonRunDB.end();
00227 
00228    for (icr=bcr; icr!=ecr; icr++) {
00229       delete icr->second;
00230       icr->second = 0;
00231    }
00232 
00233    DbRunSet::iterator ir;
00234    DbRunSet::iterator br = fDBRuns.begin();
00235    DbRunSet::iterator er = fDBRuns.end();
00236 
00237    for (ir=br; ir!=er; ir++) {
00238       if (fCommonRunDB[ir->fPolId]) {
00239          DropCommonFields((DbEntry*) &*ir);
00240          //printf("Dropping common fields from %s, %d\n", ir->fRunName.c_str(), ir->fPolId);
00241       }
00242 
00243       ir->PrintAsDbEntry(dbFile);
00244       //fCommonRunDB->UpdateFields(ir);
00245       UpdateCommonFields((DbEntry&) *ir);
00246    }
00247 
00248    dbFile.close();
00249 }

00253 void AsymDbFile::Append(DbEntry *dbrun)
00254 {
00255    DbEntry *comRun = fCommonRunDB[dbrun->fPolId];
00256 
00257    // First empty fields if in common block
00258    DbFieldMap::iterator ifld;
00259    DbFieldMap::iterator bfld = dbrun->fFields.begin();
00260    DbFieldMap::iterator efld = dbrun->fFields.end();
00261 
00262    DbFieldMap::const_iterator ifldCom = comRun->fFields.begin();
00263    DbFieldSaveFlagMap::const_iterator ifldFlag = dbrun->fFieldFlags.begin();
00264 
00265    dbrun->PrintAsDbEntry(cout);
00266 
00267    for (ifld=bfld; ifld!=efld; ifld++, ifldCom++, ifldFlag++) {
00268 
00269       if (ifld->second == ifldCom->second && !ifldFlag->second) // no star and not in common block
00270          ifld->second = "none";
00271    }
00272 
00273    ofstream dbFile;
00274    dbFile.open(fDbFileName.c_str(), ios_base::in|ios_base::ate);
00275 
00276    dbrun->PrintAsDbEntry(dbFile);
00277 
00278    dbFile.close();
00279 }

00283 void AsymDbFile::Insert(DbEntry *dbrun)
00284 {
00285    DbRunSet::iterator irun = fDBRuns.find(*dbrun);
00286 
00287    if (irun != fDBRuns.end()) { // element exists
00288       //printf("Updating run %s in database\n", dbrun->fRunName.c_str());
00289       fDBRuns.erase(irun);
00290    }
00291    //else { // element does not exist
00292    //   printf("XXX dbrun %s not found\n", dbrun->fRunName.c_str());
00293    //}
00294 
00295    printf("Inserting run \"%s\" in database\n", dbrun->fRunName.c_str());
00296    fDBRuns.insert(*dbrun);
00297 }

00299 
00304 void AsymDbFile::UpdateCommonFields(DbEntry &dbrun)
00305 {
00306    // First check the polarimeter id
00307    if (dbrun.fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"] != "none") {
00308       dbrun.fPolId = atoi(dbrun.fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"].c_str());
00309    } else {
00310       TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("\\d+\\.(\\d)\\d{2}").MatchS(dbrun.fRunName);
00311 
00312       if (subStrL->GetEntriesFast() < 1) {
00313          printf("Fatal error: no pol id\n");
00314          exit(-1);
00315       }
00316 
00317       TString spolid = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00318       delete subStrL;
00319 
00320       dbrun.fPolId = spolid.Atoi();
00321       dbrun.fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"] = spolid;
00322    }
00323 
00324    if (dbrun.fFields["START_TIME"] != "none") {
00325       dbrun.timeStamp = atoi(dbrun.fFields["START_TIME"].c_str());
00326    }
00327 
00328    //if (dbrun.fPolId == UCHAR_MAX)
00329 
00330    //printf("polId: %d\n", dbrun.fPolId);
00331 
00332    if (!fCommonRunDB[dbrun.fPolId]) {
00333       DbEntry *cr = new DbEntry();
00334 
00335       cr->fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"] = " ";
00336       sprintf(&cr->fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"][0], "%1d", dbrun.fPolId);
00337 
00338       cr->fPolId = dbrun.fPolId;
00339       fCommonRunDB[dbrun.fPolId] = cr;
00340    }
00341 
00342    fCommonRunDB[dbrun.fPolId]->UpdateFields(dbrun);
00343 }

00345 
00347 void AsymDbFile::DropCommonFields(DbEntry *dbrun)
00348 {
00349    DbEntry *cr = fCommonRunDB[dbrun->fPolId];
00350 
00351    if (!cr) { return; }
00352 
00353    DbFieldMap::iterator ifld;
00354    DbFieldMap::iterator bfld = dbrun->fFields.begin();
00355    DbFieldMap::iterator efld = dbrun->fFields.end();
00356 
00357    for (ifld=bfld; ifld!=efld; ifld++) {
00358 
00359       string &field_name  = (string&) ifld->first;
00360       string &field_value = (string&) ifld->second;
00361       string &common_field_value = cr->fFields[field_name];
00362 
00363       bool isPrivate = dbrun->fFieldFlags[field_name];
00364       //bool flag_to   = fFieldFlags[field_name];
00365 
00366       if (!isPrivate && field_value != "none" &&
00367            field_value == common_field_value)
00368       {
00369          field_value = "none";
00370       }
00371    }
00372 }

00387    }

00391 // Description : Read conditions from run.db
00392 // Input       : double RUNID
00393 // Return      : int 1
00394 //
00395 void readdb(double RUNID)
00396 {
00397    // read DB file
00398    string dbfile = "run.db";
00399    FILE *in_file;
00400 
00401    if ((in_file = fopen(dbfile.c_str(), "r")) == NULL) {
00402        gSystem->Error("   AsymDbFile::readdb", "%s file not found. Force exit", dbfile.c_str());
00403        exit(-1);
00404    }
00405 
00406    char   *line = NULL;
00407    size_t  len  = 0;
00408    int match    = 0;
00409    string s;
00410    ssize_t read;
00411 
00412    while ((read = getline(&line, &len, in_file)) != -1) {
00413 
00414       string str(line);
00415       //cout << str;
00416 
00417       if (str[0] == '[') { // Get Run Number
00418 
00419         if (str[9] == ']') {
00420           s = str.substr(1,8) ;
00421         } else if (str[10] == ']') {
00422           s = str.substr(1,9) ;
00423         } else {
00424           printf("AsymDbFile:ERROR invalid [RunID] statement in run.db. Ignored.");
00425         }
00426 
00427         gRunDb.RunID = strtod(s.c_str(),NULL);
00428         //      printf("AsymDbFile: %.3f\n",gRunDb.RunID);
00429         match = MatchPolarimetry(RUNID, gRunDb.RunID);
00430 
00431         if (match){
00432            //currRun.RunID = gRunDb.RunID;
00433 
00434            if (RUNID<gRunDb.RunID) break;
00435         }
00436 
00437       } else {
00438          if (match) {
00439             // a "*" after the flag name means only apply the flag to this run
00440             if(str.find("*=") == string::npos || RUNID == gRunDb.RunID)
00441             {
00442                if (str.find("RESET_ALL=Default")     == 1) SetDefault();
00443                if (str.find("CONFIG")                == 1) gRunDb.config_file_s         = GetVariables(str);
00444                if (str.find("MASSCUT")               == 1) gRunDb.masscut_s             = GetVariables(str);
00445                if (str.find("TSHIFT")                == 1) gRunDb.tshift_s              = GetVariables(str);
00446                if (str.find("ALPHA_CALIB_RUN_NAME=") == 1) gRunDb.alpha_calib_run_name  = GetVariables(str);
00447                if (str.find("ENERGY_CALIB=")         == 1) gRunDb.calib_file_s          = GetVariables(str);
00448                if (str.find("INJ_TSHIFT")            == 1) gRunDb.inj_tshift_s          = GetVariables(str);
00449                if (str.find("RUN_STATUS")            == 1) gRunDb.run_status_s          = GetVariables(str);
00450                if (str.find("MEASUREMENT_TYPE")      == 1) gRunDb.measurement_type_s    = GetVariables(str);
00451                if (str.find("DEFINE_SPIN_PATTERN")   == 1) gRunDb.define_spin_pattern_s = GetVariables(str);
00452                if (str.find("DEFINE_FILL_PATTERN")   == 1) gRunDb.define_fill_pattern_s = GetVariables(str);
00453                if (str.find("REFERENCE_RATE")        == 1) gRunDb.reference_rate_s      = GetVariables(str);
00454                if (str.find("TARGET_COUNT_MM")       == 1) gRunDb.target_count_mm_s     = GetVariables(str);
00455                if (str.find("COMMENT")               == 1) gRunDb.comment_s             = GetVariables(str);
00456                if (str.find("DISABLED_BUNCHES")          == 1) {
00457                   gRunDb.disable_bunch_s     = GetVariables(str);
00458                   BunchHandler(atoi(gRunDb.disable_bunch_s.c_str()), 1);
00459                }
00460                if (str.find("EnableBunch")         ==1) {
00461                   gRunDb.enable_bunch_s      = GetVariables(str);
00462                   BunchHandler(atoi(gRunDb.enable_bunch_s.c_str()),-1);
00463                }
00464                if (str.find("DISABLED_CHANNELS")        ==1) {
00465                   gRunDb.disable_strip_s     = GetVariables(str);
00466                   StripHandler(atoi(gRunDb.disable_strip_s.c_str()), 1);
00467                }
00468                if (str.find("EnableStrip")         ==1) {
00469                   gRunDb.enable_strip_s      = GetVariables(str);
00470                   StripHandler(atoi(gRunDb.enable_strip_s.c_str()),-1);
00471                }
00472             }
00473          }
00474       }
00475    }
00476 
00477    // Find Disable Strip List
00478    //gMeasInfo->NDisableStrip = FindDisableStrip();
00479 
00480    // Find Disable Bunch List
00481    //gMeasInfo->NDisableBunch = FindDisableBunch();
00482    //if (gMeasInfo->NDisableBunch) Flag.mask_bunch = 1;
00483 
00484    // processing conditions
00485    if (!extinput.CONFIG){
00486      strcat(reConfFile, gRunDb.config_file_s.c_str());
00487    }
00488 
00489    // calib directories
00490    calibdir = getenv("CALIBDIR");
00491 
00492    if ( calibdir == NULL ){
00493       cerr << "environment CALIBDIR is not defined" << endl;
00494       cerr << "e.g. export CALIBDIR=/usr/local/cnipol/calib" << endl;
00495       //exit(-1);
00496       strcpy(calibdir, ".");
00497    }
00498 
00499    strcat(CalibFile, calibdir);
00500    strcat(CalibFile, "/");
00501    strcat(CalibFile, gRunDb.calib_file_s.c_str());
00502 
00503    // Mass Cut sigma
00504    if (!extinput.MASSCUT)
00505      gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma = strtof(gRunDb.masscut_s.c_str(),NULL);
00506 
00507    // TSHIFT will be cumulated TSHIFT from run.db and -t option
00508    gAsymAnaInfo->tshift  += strtof(gRunDb.tshift_s.c_str(),NULL);
00509 
00510    // TSHIFT for injection with respect to flattop timing
00511    // removed in favour of fExpectedGlobalTimeOffset in MeasInfo
00512    //gAsymAnaInfo->inj_tshift = strtof(gRunDb.inj_tshift_s.c_str(),NULL);
00513 
00514    // Expected universal rate for given target
00515    gAsymAnaInfo->reference_rate = strtof(gRunDb.reference_rate_s.c_str(),NULL);
00516 
00517    // Target count/mm conversion
00518    gAsymAnaInfo->target_count_mm = strtof(gRunDb.target_count_mm_s.c_str(),NULL);
00519 
00520    // Optimize setting for Run
00521    if ((RUNID>=6500)&&(RUNID<7400)) { // Run05
00522       gMeasInfo->fRunId =5;
00523       for (int i=0; i<NSTRIP; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun5[i];
00524    } else if (RUNID>=7400) { // Run06
00525       gMeasInfo->fRunId =6;
00526       for (int i=0; i<NSTRIP; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun6[i];
00527    } else if (RUNID>=10018) { // Run09
00528       gMeasInfo->fRunId =9;
00529    }
00530 
00531    // Spin Pattern Recoverly
00532    Flag.spin_pattern = atoi(gRunDb.define_spin_pattern_s.c_str());
00533 
00534    // Fill Pattern Recoverly
00535    Flag.fill_pattern = atoi(gRunDb.define_fill_pattern_s.c_str());
00536 
00537    // VERBOSE mode
00538    if (Flag.VERBOSE) PrintRunDB();
00539 }

00543 void AsymDbFile::Print(const Option_t* opt) const
00544 {
00545    cout << "DB size: " << fDBRuns.size() << endl;
00546 
00547    DbRunSet::iterator ir;
00548    DbRunSet::iterator br = fDBRuns.begin();
00549    DbRunSet::iterator er = fDBRuns.end();
00550 
00551    for (ir=br; ir!=er; ir++) {
00552       ir->Print();
00553    }
00554 }

00557 // Description : handle enable/disable strips
00558 //             : Any strips ended up with ProcessStrip[st]>0 are disabled.
00559 // Input       : int st, int enable/disable flag
00560 void StripHandler(int st, int flag)
00561 {
00562    static int Initiarize = 1;
00563    if (Initiarize) for (int i=0; i<NSTRIP; i++) ProcessStrip[i]=0;
00564  
00565    ProcessStrip[st-1] += flag;
00566    Initiarize = 0;
00567 }

00570 // Description : Reset Active strip and bunch to be dafault.
00571 //             : The default is currently all active
00572 void SetDefault()
00573 {
00574    cout << "______________ Reset Active Strip and Bunch to default _______________" << endl;
00575  
00576    // initialize strip arrays
00577    for (int i=0; i<NSTRIP; i++) {
00578       ProcessStrip[i]          = 0;
00579       //gMeasInfo->ActiveStrip[i]  = 1;
00580       //gMeasInfo->fDisabledChannels[i] = 0;
00581       //gMeasInfo->NActiveStrip    = NSTRIP;
00582       //gMeasInfo->NDisableStrip   = 0;
00583    }
00584  
00585    // initialize bunch arrays
00586    for (int i=0; i<NBUNCH; i++) {
00587       ProcessBunch[i]          = 0;
00588       //gMeasInfo->DisableBunch[i] = 0;
00589       //gMeasInfo->NDisableBunch   = 0;
00590    }
00591 }

00594 // Description : This subtoutine is under construction (April 4, 06)
00595 // Input       :
00596 // Return      : NDisableStrip
00597 //
00598 int FindDisableStrip()
00599 {
00600    int NDisableStrip=0;
00601    for (int i=0;i<NSTRIP; i++) {
00602       if (ProcessStrip[i]>0) {
00603          //gMeasInfo->fDisabledChannels[NDisableStrip] = i;
00604          NDisableStrip++;
00605       }
00606    }
00607 
00608    return NDisableStrip;
00609 }

00612 // Description : handle enable/disable bunch
00613 //             : Any bunches ended up with ProcessBunch[bid]>0 are disabled.
00614 // Input       : int bunch, int enable/disable flag
00615 void BunchHandler(int bunch, int flag)
00616 {
00617    static int Initiarize = 1;
00618    if (Initiarize) for (int i=0; i<NBUNCH; i++) ProcessBunch[i]=0;
00619 
00620    ProcessBunch[bunch] += flag;
00621    Initiarize = 0;
00622 }
00623 
00624 
00625 // Description : dump disabled bunches into gMeasInfo->DisableBunch array
00626 // Input       :
00627 // Return      : NDisableBunch
00628 int FindDisableBunch()
00629 {
00630   int NDisableBunch=0;
00631   for (int i=0;i<NBUNCH; i++) {
00632     if (ProcessBunch[i]>0) {
00633       //gMeasInfo->DisableBunch[NDisableBunch] = i;
00634       NDisableBunch++;
00635     }
00636   }
00637 
00638   return NDisableBunch;
00639 }
00640 
00641 
00642 
00643 // Description : Match  the Polarimety ID between ThisRunID and RefRunID
00644 // Input       : double ThisRunID, double RefRunID
00645 // Return      : 1 if ThisRunID and RunID match Polarimetry ID
00646 int MatchPolarimetry(double ThisRunID, double RefRunID)
00647 {
00648    struct runid {
00649       char runid[10];
00650       char * polarimetry_id;
00651    } This, Ref;
00652 
00653    sprintf(This.runid, "%.3f", ThisRunID);
00654    This.polarimetry_id = strrchr(This.runid,'.') + 1;
00655 
00656    sprintf(Ref.runid, "%.3f", RefRunID);
00657    Ref.polarimetry_id = strrchr(Ref.runid,'.') +1  ;
00658 
00659    int match = (*This.polarimetry_id-*Ref.polarimetry_id) ? 0  : 1 ;
00660 
00661    return match;
00662 }
00663 
00664 
00665 // Description : compare ThisRunID and RunID and determine wheather
00666 //             : to be coninued scanning run.db
00667 // Input       : double ThisRunID, double RunID
00668 // Return      : 1 if ThisRunID <= RunID to pickup up-to-date or matching conditions
00669 //             : 0 otherwiser
00670 //
00671 int ContinueScan(double ThisRunID, double RunID)
00672 {
00673   int Continue = 1;
00674 
00675   struct runid {
00676     int Fill;
00677     int Run;
00678   } ;
00679 
00680   runid THIS;
00681   THIS.Fill = int(ThisRunID);
00682   THIS.Run = int((ThisRunID-THIS.Fill)*1e3+0.001);
00683   //                                       ^^^^^
00684   // this is so ugry but otherwise THIS.Run will be -1 of what it supposed to be
00685 
00686   runid THAT;
00687   THAT.Fill = int(RunID);
00688   THAT.Run = int((RunID-THAT.Fill)*1e3+0.001);
00689 
00690   if (THIS.Fill>=THAT.Fill){
00691     if (THIS.Run<THAT.Run) Continue = 0 ;
00692   }
00693 
00694   return Continue;
00695 }
00696

00698 // Description : Printout final varibles read from run.db
00699 //             : for Debugging
00700 void PrintRunDB()
00701 {
00702    printf("Run Status       = %s\n",    gRunDb.run_status_s.c_str());
00703    printf("Config File      = %s\n",    gRunDb.config_file_s.c_str());
00704    printf("Calib File       = %s\n",    gRunDb.calib_file_s.c_str());
00705    printf("Mass Cut         = %5.1f\n", strtof(gRunDb.masscut_s.c_str(),NULL));
00706    printf("TSHIFT           = %5.1f\n", strtof(gRunDb.tshift_s.c_str(),NULL));
00707    printf("INJ_TSHIFT       = %5.1f\n", strtof(gRunDb.inj_tshift_s.c_str(),NULL));
00708    printf("MEASUREMENT_TYPE = %5.1f\n", strtof(gRunDb.measurement_type_s.c_str(),NULL));
00709    printf("REFERENCE_RATE   = %7.3f\n", strtof(gRunDb.reference_rate_s.c_str(),NULL));
00710    printf("TARGET_COUNT_MM  = %8.5f\n", strtof(gRunDb.target_count_mm_s.c_str(),NULL));
00711    printf("COMMENT          = %s\n",    gRunDb.comment_s.c_str());
00712 }

00714 
00715 // Description : extract variables (between characters "=" and ";") from string.
00716 // Input       : string str
00717 // Return      : string variables
00718 string GetVariables(string str)
00719 {
00720   string::size_type begin  = str.find("=") + 1;
00721   string::size_type end    = str.find(";");
00722   string::size_type length = end - begin ;
00723 
00724   return str.substr(begin,length);
00725 }
00726

00733   string::size_type length = end - begin ;
00734

00736   return strtof(s.c_str(),NULL);
